definition: Ningnan county in Liangshan Yi autonomous prefecture 涼山彞族自治州|凉山彝族自治州[Liang2 shan1 Yi2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], south Sichuan
abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning
Ningnan county in Liangshan Yi autonomous prefecture 涼山彞族自治州|凉山彝族自治州[Liang2 shan1 Yi2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], south Sichuan

sentences.english: Induced accumulation of the acidic pathogenesis-related proteins ( PRs ) in tobacco leaves by ningnanmycin was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了寧南黴素對菸草酸性病程相關蛋白的誘導表達。

sentences.english: In the semi-arid region of southern Ningxia, grassland exists expensively, and species are abundant.
sentences.chinese: 寧南半乾旱區天然草場面積遼闊，植物種類繁多。
